price: Onlar; “Rabbimizi tesbih ederiz. Şüphesiz biz, zalim kimseler imişiz.” dediler.
arabic: قَالُواْ سُبۡحَٰنَ رَبِّنَآ إِنَّا كُنَّا ظَٰلِمِينَ

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: qālū sub'ḥāna rabbinā innā kunnā ẓālimīna
